biotools.summary: Research and Exploratory Analysis Driven-Time-data Visualization (read-tv) is a shiny application and associated console interface designed for visualizing changepoints in irregularly and regularly spaced longitudinal data. Technical users can rapidly view data through the R console interface, and non-technical users can use it as a standard web application. Intermediate users, as well as users who want to replicate plots, will benefit from the source code generation associated with any plot.
